A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If I wasn't with my kids I would of walked out.  Intergalactic magic tricks that kill you? Mary Poppins in the cold of space? Obligatory game of thrones tree and class warfare planet complete with animal abuse?  Who's snoke? Anybody can be a jedi if they kinda try. Just a model UN conference flying around in the millenials falcon.  There were some good scenes per say\, but this is on par with phantom menace and clones as the worst of this enterprise and doesn't project well for the Disney. Just horrible writing.
